data.title: Great place for... LUNCH?!
data.text:
This review is for lunch/food, not the late night dance club scene.

A surprising place to get a decent, value-priced lunch. While not as many items available as other more typical Viet eateries, there are enough options to satisfy anyone (though I'm hesitant to try pho at a non-pho place).

Bo Luc Lac is tasty and well prepared, serviced with white rice and side salad.

Egg Rolls are delicious.

Banh Xeo is nice and crispy, but it helps if you ask them to do it with not too much oil.

Service was quite attentive and quick.
